description: Try our easy to follow Charred Prawn Salad with Bloody Mary Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Charred Prawn Salad with Bloody Mary Dressing
name: Charred Prawn Salad with Bloody Mary Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange tomato, spinach, onion, basil and prawns on a platter or board. Drizzle over dressing and serve.
